mapper.insert: insert into GOODS(NUM, GOODSCODE, GOODSNAME, CONTENT, PRICE, HEART, STOCK) values(GOODS_SEQ.nextval, #{goodsCode}, #{goodsName}, #{content}, #{price}, #{heart}, #{stock})
mapper.update: update GOODS set HEART=#{heart} where GOODSCODE=#{goodsCode}
mapper.select: select GD.GOODSCODE GOODSCODE,GD.GOODSNAME GOODSNAME,GD.REGDATE REGDATE,GD.HEART HEART, GD.STOCK STOCK,nvl(SA.TOTALCNT,0) TOTALCNT from GOODS GD left outer join (select GOODSCODE, count(GOODSCODE) TOTALCNT from GOODS_SALES group by GOODSCODE) SA on GD.GOODSCODE = SA.GOODSCODE order by GD.HEART desc, GD.REGDATE desc

select.if: select GD.GOODSCODE ,GD.GOODSNAME ,GD.REGDATE ,GD.HEART , GD.PRICE, nvl(FI.SAVENAME, null) SAVENAME from GOODS GD left outer join (select IMAGE.GOODSCODE , IMAGE.SAVENAME from GOODS_IMAGE IMAGE, (select GOODSCODE, min(NUM) MINI from GOODS_IMAGE group by GOODSCODE) IMSI where IMAGE.NUM = IMSI.MINI) FI on GD.GOODSCODE = FI.GOODSCODE order by GD.HEART desc, GD.REGDATE desc

select GD.GOODSCODE ,GD.GOODSNAME ,GD.REGDATE ,GD.HEART , GD.PRICE, nvl(FI.SAVENAME, null) SAVENAME from GOODS GD left outer join (select IMAGE.GOODSCODE , IMAGE.SAVENAME from GOODS_IMAGE IMAGE, (select GOODSCODE, min(NUM) MINI from GOODS_IMAGE group by GOODSCODE) IMSI where IMAGE.NUM = IMSI.MINI) FI on GD.GOODSCODE = FI.GOODSCODE order by GD.PRICE desc, GD.HEART desc

select GD.GOODSCODE ,GD.GOODSNAME ,GD.REGDATE ,GD.HEART , GD.PRICE, nvl(FI.SAVENAME, null) SAVENAME from GOODS GD left outer join (select IMAGE.GOODSCODE , IMAGE.SAVENAME from GOODS_IMAGE IMAGE, (select GOODSCODE, min(NUM) MINI from GOODS_IMAGE group by GOODSCODE) IMSI where IMAGE.NUM = IMSI.MINI) FI on GD.GOODSCODE = FI.GOODSCODE order by GD.PRICE asc, GD.HEART desc

mapper.select: select GOODSCODE, GOODSNAME, CONTENT, PRICE from GOODS where GOODSCODE=#{goodsCode}
select count(GOODSCODE) from GOODS where GOODSCODE=#{goodsCode}
mapper.update: update GOODS set STOCK=STOCK+#{stock} where GOODSCODE=#{goodsCode}
mapper.select: select GD.GOODSCODE ,GD.GOODSNAME , GD.PRICE, nvl(FI.SAVENAME, null) SAVENAME from (select ROWNUM, GOODSCODE, GOODSNAME, REGDATE, HEART, PRICE from (select * from GOODS order by REGDATE desc) where ROWNUM <= 10) GD left outer join (select IMAGE.GOODSCODE , IMAGE.SAVENAME from GOODS_IMAGE IMAGE, (select GOODSCODE, min(NUM) MINI from GOODS_IMAGE group by GOODSCODE) IMSI where IMAGE.NUM = IMSI.MINI) FI on GD.GOODSCODE = FI.GOODSCODE order by GD.REGDATE desc

select GD.GOODSCODE ,GD.GOODSNAME , GD.PRICE, nvl(FI.SAVENAME, null) SAVENAME from GOODS GD left outer join (select IMAGE.GOODSCODE , IMAGE.SAVENAME from GOODS_IMAGE IMAGE, (select GOODSCODE, min(NUM) MINI from GOODS_IMAGE group by GOODSCODE) IMSI where IMAGE.NUM = IMSI.MINI) FI on GD.GOODSCODE = FI.GOODSCODE where GD.HEART = 'yes' order by GD.REGDATE desc
